item.title: Comment on Patrick Collison on classic novels by So
item.description:
I really am tired of being asked to care about the opinions of the same half dozen rationalist tech 'thought leaders' who have very little of interest to offer, and who all seem to write in the same turgid, try-hard way. I hope I see less of this in 2025, one way or another.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/12/patrick-collison-on-classic-novels.html?commentID=160850885

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/12/patrick-collison-on-classic-novels.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=patrick-collison-on-classic-novels

Votes: 54⬆ 9⬇
item.dc:creator: So

item.title: Comment on Steve Davis, Elon Musk’s Go-To Cost-Cutter Is Working for DOGE by Dilbert T. Washington
item.description:
Say what you will about Trump, Elon, and DOGE, if Kamala had been elected you wouldn't have people like Steve coming in to help the federal government cut costs. Excited if this bears fruit.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/12/steve-davis-elon-musks-go-to-cost-cutter-is-working-for-doge.html?commentID=160850796
